title: Which screen recorder is better: Bandicam or Camtasia? - Quora

response.answer_text: In my opinion, it depends on your demands. Camtasia has an advantage over other screen recorders in powerful editor. If you have high requirement in editing, then Camtasia is a good choice for you. As for Bandicam, it’s good at gameplay capture and device capture. So it’s on your list if you have needs in these two factors. However, I use neither of them. Instead I use RecMaster which is a lightweight and feature-rich application. It’s able to record live streaming, online course, high-paced gameplay … So you need to decide in accordance with your actual situation.

Let’s get straight to the point, Camtasia is better. Camtasia surpasses Bandicam in both downloads and search volume. Here are the specific statistics Bandicam has earned 601658 downloads so far and the number for search volume is 847100 in April 2020. As for Camtasia, the numbers are 2703049 and 1792490 BTW, among all the screen recorders stand a newly born - RecMaster. It charges the least and manifests moderate performance.
